title: TCL 30 series debuts at MWC alongside more foldable concepts and Android tablets
content:
MWC 2022 brought the debut of a lot of new tech, and TCL arrived at the event with an updated Android portfolio of tablets, foldable concepts, and the rest of the TCL 30 series.

moreâ€¦

The post TCL 30 series debuts at MWC alongside more foldable concepts and Android tablets appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: At MWC 2022, TCL announced the TCL 30 series alongside a new batch of Android tablets, and some new foldable concepts.
